title: (x) What is this font? / Sans on Pololu building, Las Vegas - Futura Extra Bold {Stephen L}
content:
I feel really silly asking this question, since i'm pretty sure the answer is obvious, however, I just can't remember what font this is! I keep thinking I know it, but can't seem to find it anywhere.

Can someone help? I know it's not the best photo, but I need to know the font for Pololu on the sign on the building.

Thanks!

[http://www.pololu.com/about](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213841/http:/www.pololu.com/about "http://www.pololu.com/about")
author: PopmilkDesign

comments.content: Hi Katy. I'd say it's [Futura Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213841/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/futura_extra_bold_ot_std/?&sample_text=Pololu&sample_size=60).
